title: Expense Tracker
description: Developed an expense tracker using ReactJS to effectively manage and monitor daily expenditures, leveraging Material UI for component design.

title: Face-Detector
description: Created a web app for facial detection using ReactJS, NodeJS, and PostgreSQL. Integrated Clarifai's face detection module for image analysis.

title: Chat Application
description: Developed a Chat Application with ReactJS and Spring-Boot, enabling group and private messaging functionalities.
